nodes.name: orderTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Releases a clearable transfer, which means that the tokens are transferred from the payer to the payee. Only a notary can successfully execute this action.
@param transferId The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
nodes.name: releaseTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only once that the hold has expired can this action successfully be executed.
@param transferId The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
nodes.name: revokeTransferByExpiration

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only the assigned notary can successfully execute this action.
@param transferId The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
nodes.name: revokeTransferByNotary

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only the target of the transfer can successfully execute this action.
@param transferId The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
nodes.name: revokeTransferByTarget

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer is ordered.
nodes.name: TransferOrdered

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer is released.
nodes.name: TransferReleased

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer is revoked.
nodes.name: TransferRevoked

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer with an already existing transfer id is tried to order
nodes.name: TransferIdExists
orderTransfer

@param transferId The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
nodes.name: releaseTransfer

nodes.name: revokeTransferByTarget

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer is ordered.
nodes.name: TransferOrdered

nodes.documentation: @notice Is emitted when a clearable transfer is released.
nodes.name: TransferReleased

nodes.name: TransferIdExists

params.target: The address of the payee, to whom the tokens are to be paid if released
params.transferId: The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer
The unique ID to identify the clearable transfer

orderTransfer(string,address,uint256).notice: Orders a clearable transfer on behalf of the msg.sender in favor of `target`. A notary is responsible to either release or revoke the transfer.

releaseTransfer(string).notice: Releases a clearable transfer, which means that the tokens are transferred from the payer to the payee. Only a notary can successfully execute this action.

revokeTransferByExpiration(string).notice: Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only once that the hold has expired can this action successfully be executed.

revokeTransferByNotary(string).notice: Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only the assigned notary can successfully execute this action.

revokeTransferByTarget(string).notice: Revokes a clearable transfer, which means that the amount that is held is available again to the payer and no transfer is done. Only the target of the transfer can successfully execute this action.
